message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500.  I think you'll find this price very competitive given its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. However,  $11,500 is my bottom line. I know the value of this product, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000, but that's my final offer. I'm starting to consider buying from John for $12,000 if we can't come to an agreement.
